item.title: Monitoring
item.description: Choria Server is designed to not open any listening ports unless its Apple HomeKit integration is enabled. Without any opening ports monitoring it is via a state file that it writes regularly when enabled: plugin.choria.status_file_path = /var/log/choria-status.json plugin.choria.status_update_interval = 30 The above configuration will cause the status file to update every 30 seconds. This needs to be enabled for any deep introspection. Nagios Check A nagios protocol test is included in the command choria tool status, this can check various aspects of the server operation.
